media:group.media:title: eigenchris's Math/Physics YouTube Channel Recommendations
media:group.media:description:
[A1] Robert Davie https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCm7lQ5bSq6yBHVPYJ7J561w
[A2] Dietterich Labs https://www.youtube.com/c/DietterichLabs/videos
[A3] dXoverdteqprogress https://www.youtube.com/user/dXoverdteqprogress/videos
[A4] XylyXylyX https://www.youtube.com/user/XylyXylyX/videos
[A5] Noah Explains Physics https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCZSC7wgBq3RSLKoJDfGL0Rg/videos
[A6] Physics with Elliot: https://www.youtube.com/c/PhysicswithElliot/videos
[A7] Sander Konijnenberg https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCb4KzvTvz-9kMuL3-9Nj_fA/videos

[B1] Alex Flournoy https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCHAwDVSS8oDLLln07cNdU6A/videos
[B2] Frederic P Schuller https://www.youtube.com/c/FredericSchuller/videos
[B2 also] Schuller's General Relativity playlist on a separate channel: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLFeEvEPtX_0S6vxxiiNPrJbLu9aK1UVC_ 
[B3] Hitoshi Murayama https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCoIq8T6hxfk6ZtLBv9CMCnQ/videos
[B4] Peter Woit https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCdSEKN94Jo1xjUHVyfEfIjg
Peter Woit's work-in-progress text: https://www.math.columbia.edu/~woit/QMbook/qmbook-latest.pdf
[B5] Leonard Susskind (individual courses are 10 videos each) https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLLjeznqO-C0AVy5P39Hbybl0ew_03IkIx
[B6] Tadashi Tokieda https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SXHHvoaSctc&list=PLTBqohhFNBE_09L0i-lf3fYXF5woAbrzJ
[B7] Introduction to differential forms playlist https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLB8F2D70E034E9C29

[C1] Snoopy Topology Notes https://www.math.colostate.edu/~renzo/teaching/Topology10/Notes.pdf
[C2] Quick and Dirty Introduction to Exterior Algebra
https://web.archive.org/web/20191221153300/http://brickisland.net/cs177/?p=174
https://web.archive.org/web/20191221153400/http://brickisland.net/cs177/?p=184
https://web.archive.org/web/20191221195625/http://brickisland.net/cs177/?p=200
https://web.archive.org/web/20191222002003/http://brickisland.net/cs177/?p=248
https://web.archive.org/web/20191221104907/http://brickisland.net/cs177/?p=264
[C2 also] The author of the above has a YouTube channel: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL9_jI1bdZmz0hIrNCMQW1YmZysAiIYSSS
[C3] Sean Carroll GR Lecture Notes https://www.preposterousuniverse.com/grnotes/
[C4] Exploring Black Holes: https://www.eftaylor.com/exploringblackholes/
[C5] Catalogue of Spacetimes https://arxiv.org/pdf/0904.4184.pdf
[C6] Einstein's Papers Online
https://einsteinpapers.press.princeton.edu/
